short_summary: Renewal/Upgrade replacement of various infrastructure and data services
description: The Treasury Board of Canada (Contracting Entity) issues a notice for the Request For Proposal (RFP) of the renewal/upgrade Replacement of various infrastructure and data services for the Government of Canada.
duration_in_months: You will summarize and format the given data while providing an explanatory text in the specified format and style, potentially expanding on relevant information as needed.",
full_summary:
## TBIPS - Professional Services (DATA)

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: pw-22-01006549
* **Solicitation Number**: 24062-23-040
* **Publication Date**: September 8, 2022
* **Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified

### Tender Status
* **Status**: Exired (No Longer Accepting Tenders)

### Contracting Entity Information
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Treasury Board of Canada
* **Address**: 90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5, Canada

### Tender Requirements
The Treasury Board of Canada requires Informatics Professional Services to plan, design, build, test, implement, configure/develop, support, enhance, and maintain various current and future infrastructure and data services, products, and technologies.

### Key Requirements
* Professional services in informatics for the planning, design, build, test, implementation, configuration/development, support, enhancement, and maintenance of current and future infrastructure and data services, products, and technologies.

### Contact Information
* **Contact Person**: Lars Norgaard, lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca, 343-550-7003

### Additional Information
Please refer to the associated document for more information regarding the tender requirements and qualifications.

* [French Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/08/abeeed48c774bfaf2bcf1b07bbfb3a46/sct_ddp_24062-23-040_apm.pdf) tom_ward May 5, 2023 10:59am
